proposal.fictionalClientDescription: Urban Roots Interior Design is a boutique firm serving residential and commercial clients throughout Kelowna. With a focus on modern, sustainable spaces, their team brings creativity and expertise to every project.
proposal.coverHeadline: Elevate Your Online Presence: A Custom Digital Growth Proposal for Urban Roots Interior Design
proposal.coverSubheadline: Transforming your brand’s digital visibility and lead generation in Kelowna.
proposal.clientOverview:
Urban Roots Interior Design has built a strong reputation in Kelowna for delivering thoughtfully designed interiors that blend modern aesthetics with sustainability. Your team has grown steadily through word of mouth and repeat business, and you’re now looking to attract new clients—particularly higher-value commercial projects—through a stronger online presence. You’ve invested in branding and have a basic website, but you’re ready to take things to the next level.

With competition increasing in the local interior design market, you’ve identified the need for a more polished, user-friendly website and a robust digital marketing strategy. Your goals include increasing website traffic, generating more qualified leads, and establishing Urban Roots as a top-rated choice for interior design in Kelowna and the Okanagan region. You’re seeking a partner who can provide both strategic guidance and hands-on execution, freeing up your team to focus on client projects.
proposal.problemAnalysis:
Currently, Urban Roots’ website is visually appealing but lacks the structure and optimization needed to convert visitors into inquiries. The site does not rank well for key local search terms, making it difficult for prospective clients to find you when searching for interior designers in Kelowna. There is limited tracking in place, so it’s hard to know which marketing efforts are working, and you’ve noticed that competitors are appearing more prominently in Google searches and local directories.

Additionally, your team is stretched thin, and managing digital marketing in-house has become unsustainable. You’re missing out on opportunities to showcase your best work, capture leads from Google Ads, and engage your audience consistently on platforms like Instagram. Without a proactive partner, it’s challenging to keep your web presence current and competitive.
proposal.opportunitySection:
With a refreshed website, strategic local SEO, and targeted digital marketing, Urban Roots can capture more of the right clients—those who value design expertise and are ready to invest in quality. By optimizing your website for both search engines and user experience, we’ll ensure you’re visible when local homeowners and business owners search for interior design services. A tailored Google Ads and Instagram Marketing campaign will further boost your reach, bringing in qualified leads and building brand awareness.

Our approach is hands-on and transparent: we’ll work closely with you to showcase your portfolio, highlight testimonials, and position Urban Roots as Kelowna’s go-to interior design firm. With clear reporting and ongoing support, you’ll have full visibility into what’s working—and the freedom to focus on your clients, knowing your digital presence is in expert hands.

recommendedServices.name: Custom Web Design & Development
recommendedServices.description: We’ll craft a visually stunning, high-converting website tailored to Urban Roots’ brand, with a focus on user experience and mobile responsiveness. Your new site will showcase your portfolio, highlight client testimonials, and make it easy for visitors to request consultations.

recommendedServices.name: Local SEO & Google Business Profile Management
recommendedServices.description: We’ll optimize your site and Google Business Profile for local search, ensuring Urban Roots appears in the top results when clients search for interior design services in Kelowna.

recommendedServices.name: Google Ads Management
recommendedServices.description: We’ll design and manage targeted Google Ads campaigns to capture high-intent leads searching for interior design in your area, maximizing your ad spend and return on investment.

recommendedServices.name: Instagram Marketing & Content Optimization
recommendedServices.description: We’ll elevate your Instagram presence, planning and scheduling posts that showcase your latest projects and engage your local audience. All content will be optimized for reach and engagement.

recommendedServices.name: Ongoing Website Maintenance & Support
recommendedServices.description: We’ll keep your website secure, up to date, and running smoothly, so you never have to worry about technical issues or missed opportunities.

implementationPhases.description: We’ll kick off with a strategy session to understand your brand, goals, and target audience. We’ll audit your current digital presence and map out a step-by-step plan.

Our team will design and build your new website, integrating local SEO best practices and optimizing your Google Business Profile. We’ll gather content, images, and testimonials to showcase your work.
We’ll launch Google Ads and Instagram campaigns, ensuring all tracking is in place. Your website will go live, and we’ll provide training on using your new digital assets.
We’ll monitor performance, provide monthly reports, and adjust strategies to maximize your results. Ongoing maintenance and support will ensure your site stays secure and up to date.

proposal.timelineTotal: 8 weeks to launch, ongoing optimization thereafter

pricingTiers.description: Perfect for businesses seeking a professional website and essential local SEO setup.
Ideal for businesses ready to invest in ongoing digital marketing and maintenance for accelerated growth.
features: Google Ads campaign setup & management (2 months)

pricingTiers.description: For established firms seeking a comprehensive, long-term digital growth partnership with extended support.

caseExamples.title: Kelowna Veterinary Hospital: Local SEO & Website Redesign
caseExamples.context: A prominent Kelowna vet clinic needed to modernize their website and boost local search rankings.
caseExamples.result: Within 3 months, organic search traffic increased by 62% and new client inquiries doubled.

caseExamples.title: Okanagan Custom Cabinetry: Google Ads Success
caseExamples.context: A cabinetry firm wanted to generate more leads from homeowners and contractors.
caseExamples.result: Google Ads campaigns delivered a 4x return on ad spend and reduced cost per lead by 36%.

proposal.ctaHeadline: Let’s Transform Urban Roots’ Digital Presence—Together
proposal.ctaBody: Ready to become Kelowna’s most sought-after interior design firm? Let’s schedule a call to discuss your vision and how we can help you reach your goals.

enriched.positioning: Thriveline positions itself as a boutique, woman-owned digital agency that provides hands-on, expert web design and SEO services for Kelowna businesses seeking reliable, results-driven online growth.
valuePropositions: Personal, responsive service from a small, expert team
Custom solutions tailored to each business, never templates
Results-focused strategies that support real business goals
Ongoing support and proactive website care
differentiators: Woman-owned, local agency with deep Kelowna roots
Direct access to a small, skilled team (no passing between departments)
Focus on education, transparency, and honest pricing
Custom, non-templated solutions and proactive support
Clients retain full ownership and control of their digital assets
